body_html:
Hmm - installed all of 8.0. The build gets much further but then this:

patfla@patfla-N550JV:~/code/tensorflow$ bazel build -c opt --config=cuda //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer 
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /home/patfla/code/tensorflow/tensorflow/cc/BUILD:199:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer' failed: crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed: error executing command third_party/gpus/crosstool/clang/bin/crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc -o bazel-out/local_linux-opt/bin/tensorflow/cc/tutorials_example_trainer ... (remaining 805 argument(s) skipped): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.

crosstool_wrapper_driver_is_not_gcc failed
